meanings.definition: A thin membrane that partially covers the opening of the vagina in some females.
meanings.sent1: During biology class, we learned about the hymens in the female reproductive system.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the presence of hymens can vary among individuals.
meanings.sent3: Sarah giggled when she heard about hymens in health class.
meanings.sent4: The delicate hymens were compared to a fragile barrier by the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The image of hymens was etched in my mind after the lesson.

meanings.definition: A fold of mucous membrane partly closing the external orifice of the vagina.
meanings.sent1: The nurse discussed the importance of hymens in female anatomy.
meanings.sent2: Some cultures have traditional beliefs surrounding hymens.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about hymens in a lighthearted manner.
meanings.sent4: The hymens were likened to a secret veil by the storyteller.
meanings.sent5: The concept of hymens was illustrated vividly in the textbook.
